NazcaXchange
NazcaXchange offers information services to companies that produce data driven products.
NazcaXchange facilitates electronic extraction of data required to complete a specific part of a real estate transaction, Court Case Documents, Personal Details etc
e.g.: The title commitment, Fore Closure, Lien Judgment, Marriage and Divorce Details.
With this solution offering, the turn around time for data acquisition is drastically reduced for the end users of this system.
The system offers cost effective data aggregation and extraction services. The system offers full packaged data solutions as against the partial data solutions available in the market now.
